title: Australia current and future climate data
description: Australia-wide bioclimatic variable spatial layers. This collection includes a baseline current climate as well as future climate scenarios. In summary, 19 climate surfaces for each of 1297 projections (current + 9 emissions scenarios x 18 GCMs * 8 time points).
attribution: Vanderwal, Jeremy. (2012). All future climate layers for Australia - 5km resolution. James Cook University.
